title: Ducks' defense blanks Tech to reach CFP semis
content: Matayo Uiagalelei caused a fumble to set up a touchdown as the Ducks silenced Texas Tech 23-0 in the Orange Bowl to reach the College Football Playoff semifinals.

title: Sources: Aikman to advise Fins on GM search
content: The Dolphins have brought on Hall of Fame quarterback and ESPN analyst Troy Aikman as a consultant to advise the organization on its general manager search process, per sources.

title: Lamar: I'm playing, have never quit on Ravens
content: Lamar Jackson says he's expecting to play when the Ravens take on the Steelers in Pittsburgh for the AFC North title Sunday night.

title: Sources: MRI comes back clean on Wemby's knee
content: An MRI on Thursday showed that Spurs center Victor Wembanyama did not suffer any ligament damage to his left knee, sources told ESPN. He's out for Friday's matchup at the Pacers and will be questionable to face Portland the following night.

title: Jefferson confident McCarthy can be Vikes' No. 1
content: As the Minnesota Vikings set their sights on next season, Justin Jefferson said Thursday he would "love to have" J.J. McCarthy as the top quarterback next season despite a rocky year that has yielded the least productive campaign of the receiver's career.

title: Source: Saints WR Olave out due to blood clot
content: Saints wide receiver Chris Olave developed a blood clot and will miss the team's season finale against the Falcons, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: Sources: Japanese ace pitcher Imai to join Astros
content: Star Japanese right-hander Tatsuya Imai and the Astros are in agreement on a free agent contract, sources told ESPN.

title: Love clears protocol but will sit out until playoffs
content: Jordan Love has cleared the concussion protocol, but the Green Bay Packers do not intend to play him until the playoffs.

title: üèà Barnwell names his annual All-Pro team
content: Jaxon Smith-Njigba and Puka Nacua were clear WR picks, but the CB group was hard to sort out. Which 50 players made Bill Barnwell's list?

title: Will Ole Miss be the latest team to get revenge in a CFP rematch?
content: The Sugar Bowl showdown will mark the fifth time in the playoff era that two teams will meet in the CFP.

title: Ravens vs. Steelers: Answering six questions ahead of Sunday's AFC North showdown
content: For years, this feud has become must-watch TV, and Sunday won't be any different in a "winner-takes-all" game.

title: 16 teams in the NFL playoff mix, 16 potential downfalls: Let's find each roster's fatal flaw
content: We found fatal flaws for all 12 clinched teams in the playoff field, plus the AFC North and NFC South teams trying to join them entering Week 18.

title: The NHL is back at the Olympics! Everything you need to know about hockey in Milan Cortina
content: Many of the world's best hockey players will face off in Italy. What's the format? Who are the favorites and top players?

title: What does James Nnaji's eligibility mean -- now and for the future?
content: The former pro signed with Baylor midseason. How did it happen, and what does this mean for the sport?

title: Why Pilates is more than a New Year's resolution for some of the NFL's best
content: Stefon Diggs, Nik Bonitto, Will Anderson and more players are utilizing Pilates to activate core muscles.

title: What we're hearing on the NFL coaching carousel: Latest buzz on top candidates, potential openings
content: Which teams will make coaching changes? Could Jeff Hafley or Chris Shula land an open job? Here's our coach movement intel ahead of Week 18.

title: 26 QBs to watch in the college football transfer portal
content: From top targets to top backups, we've tiered QBs ahead of the transfer portal officially opening Jan. 2.

title: Our favorite games of 2025: World Series Game 7, four-homer performances and much more
content: From playoff thrillers to epic individual achievements, see the moments we'll remember for decades to come.

title: Women's Power Rankings: Something's Bruin at UCLA
content: During a week with a lean schedule, one thing became clear: The rest of the Big Ten is looking up at UCLA.

title: Bracketology: Are the top seeds already decided?
content: March is months away, but UConn, Texas, South Carolina, UCLA and LSU look locked in on the top two seed lines.

title: Bracketology: Vanderbilt is exceeding expectations as a projected 2-seed
content: The unbeaten 'Dores weren't expected to be this good this season, but we could very well see history made in March.

title: New year, same problems for a Liverpool side lacking depth, dynamism
content: Devoid of the swagger that marked last season's title run, Liverpool's draw with Leeds showed how much work remains for Arne Slot.

title: Don't expect Chelsea to hire an elite coach after Maresca split
content: Chelsea used to demand success, hiring the world's best coaches to deliver results. Enzo Maresca's departure reveals that that's no longer the case.

title: Messi will score his 900th career goal in 2026. Can he reach 1,000? Can he pass Ronaldo?
content: Lionel Messi is never far from his next record or landmark, and he enters 2026 on the verge of yet another massive milestone: his 900th goal.

title: What NBA moment will define 2025? Looking back at the most memorable events since 1954
content: On the heels of the new year, ESPN analyst Zach Kram picks a moment from each basketball season that NBA fans will most likely learn about and remember for years to come.

title: Caitlin Clark talks new shoe, football on Kelces' 'New Heights' podcast
content: The Indiana Fever guard discussed the process of creating her signature shoe, which will debut this spring, among other topics.

title: The storylines that will define F1 as it enters a new era in 2026
content: To celebrate the start of a new year, we bid adieu to 2025 and F1's ground-effect era and welcome new rules that will dominate the headlines in 2026.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool want Camavinga, Salah to Roma?
content: Liverpool are keen on signing Real Madrid midfielder Eduardo Camavinga. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Seven questions Liverpool must answer in January
content: The January transfer window is open, and top clubs like Liverpool have big and expensive decisions to make.

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks and projected scores for Week 18
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: DraftKings DFS cheat sheet: Best values for Sunday's main slate
content: Identifying players to spend up for, teams to stack, value picks to grab and players you need to avoid.

title: NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani Vows To Govern "Expansively" In Inaugural Speech
content: Zohran Mamdani became mayor of New York City on Thursday, taking over one of the most unrelenting jobs in American politics with a promise to transform government on behalf of the city's striving, struggling working class.

title: Iran Arrests 30 In Tehran For "Disturbing Public Order": Report
content: Iranian authorities in Tehran have arrested 30 suspects accused of public order offences, the news agency Tasnim reported Thursday, after days of protests against high prices that have at times turned deadly.

title: Indian-Origin Zohran Mamdani Inaugurated As New York's First Muslim Mayor
content: Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as New York City's mayor on Thursday, becoming the city's 112th mayor and making history in the process. The ceremony took place on the steps of City Hall, where hundreds gathered to witness the moment.

title: Trump Says He's Dropping Push For National Guard In Chicago, Portland, LA
content: President Donald Trump said he's dropping  for now  his push to deploy National Guard troops in Chicago, Los Angeles and Portland, Oregon, a move that comes after legal roadblocks held up the effort.

title: Stalled Contracts, Contamination: How 11 Died In Indore Water Tragedy
content: The contaminated drinking water in Indore's Bhagirathpura has now cost 11 lives and more than 1,400 residents have been affected.

title: Haryana Gangster Vikas Gulia, Associate Jailed For Life
content: A Delhi court has sentenced Haryana gangster Vikas Gulia and his associate to life imprisonment under MCOCA provisions, but refused the death penalty saying the offences did not fall under the category of 'rarest of the rare cases'.

title: Cricketer Plays Match In J&K With Palestine Flag on Helmet, Summoned By Cops
content: A controversy has erupted over the use of the Palestinian flag by a cricketer during a domestic league match in Jammu and Kashmir. Furqan Bhat had used a Palestinian flag on his helmet while playing a match in the Jammu and Kashmir Champions League.

title: Man Dies After Falling From 15th Floor In Noida On New Year's Eve: Cops
content: A 31-year-old man died after allegedly falling from the 15th floor of a residential society in Greater Noida while celebrating New Year's Eve with his friends, police said on Thursday.

title: UP Cop 'Scans' Man With Mobile Phone, Calls Him Bangladeshi. Video Viral
content: The Uttar Pradesh Police have come under criticism and ridicule on social media after their personnel were seen doing the impossible in Ghaziabad near Delhi.

title: 1 Killed As Supporters Of Congress Leader, Another MLA Clash In Karnataka
content: Tensions are high in Karnataka's Ballari district after a man was killed in a clash that broke out when Congress workers tried to put a banner ahead of a Valmiki statue unveiling event scheduled tomorrow.

title: 6 Killed In Iran Protests Over Economy As Inflation Hits 42%
content: Widening demonstrations sparked by Iran's ailing economy spread Thursday into the Islamic Republic's rural provinces, with at least six people being killed in the first fatalities reported among security forces and protesters, authorities said.

title: Wayanad Landslide Victims To Get 300 Houses Next Month
content: Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan said on Thursday that the state government aims to complete about 300 houses with related facilities and hand them over in February as the first phase of rehabilitation for Wayanad landslide disaster victims.

title: Probe Agency ED Freezes Assets Worth Rs 192 Crore Possessed By ZO Games
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has frozen worth around Rs 192 crores in the form of bank balances, Fixed Deposit Receipts (FDRs), and mutual funds possessed by ZO Games Pvt Ltd, a fully owned Indian subsidiary of Winzo Pvt Ltd.

title: Man Beaten To Death Over Talking To Married Woman In Rajasthan: Cops
content: A 22-year-old man was allegedly beaten to death in Rajasthan's Sriganganagar district by the brothers of a married woman after they objected to him speaking to her over the phone, police said on Thursday.

title: "Will Take Legal Action": Vodafone Idea On Rs 638-Crore GST Penalty
content: Vodafone Idea on Thursday said it has received a GST penalty order of Rs 637.91 crore, passed under Section 74 of the Central Goods and Services Tax Act (CGST), 2017.

title: 40 Killed, 115 Injured In Fire At Swiss Ski Resort Bar During New Year Party
content: About 40 people were killed and another 115 injured in a massive fire at a bar in Switzerland's Crans Montana. The blaze ripped through a bar called Le Constellation in the luxury Alpine ski resort town during New Year's celebrations.

title: "Petrol Poured On His Head": Wife Of Hindu Man Attacked In Bangladesh
content: The devastated wife of a minority Hindu man, who was attacked with sharp weapons and set afire in Bangladesh, is at a loss for words.

title: "We Added Water To Packaged Milk": Indore Family Loses 5-Month-Old
content: "God gave us happiness after ten years... and then God took it away," murmuring this repeatedly, an elderly woman weeps quietly in a narrow lane of Indore's Bhagirathpura.

title: India To Receive Its 1st Bullet Train On Aug 15 Next Year: Ashwini Vaishnaw
content: Railways Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Thursday indicated that India is likely to receive its first Bullet Train on August 15, 2027.

title: Brazil Top Court Denies Ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's Plea For House Arrest
content: Brazil's Supreme Court has rejected former president Jair Bolsonaro's request to convert his prison sentence for plotting a coup to house arrest, according to a ruling published Thursday.

title: Owaisi advocates enhanced education access and standards in Telangana
content: I would like to be known for my work in the education field rather than my political speeches, says AIMIM MLA Akbaruddin Owaisi

title: State records 5.78% growth in net GST collections in December 2025
content: At ‚Çπ2,652 crore, the collections are the highest-ever for the month of December since the GST regime began in 2017, says official

title: Approached HC 104 times to hold rallies in West Bengal: BJP leader
content: Suvendu Adhikari said that interventions by the Calcutta High Court were necessary because the police routinely denied permission ‚Äòpurely to stifle opposition voices and crush democratic rights‚Äô

title: ED searches seven locations in Rajasthan in Digi Mudra scam case
content: The ED initiated investigation based on the first information reports registered by the Special Task Force, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, and other police stations in various districts of Rajasthan, Haryana, Odisha and Maharashtra

title: ED attaches ‚Çπ33.66-crore assets in Birla Emporium-Ira Finance case
content: The ED probe is based on a First Information Report registered by the police in Manipur,  against Yumnam Irabanta Singh, director of Birla Emporium and Ira Finance

title: Nadia bomb blast victim Tamanna‚Äôs mother hospitalised¬†in Kolkata after condition deteriorates
content: Opposition blames government and police for the situation; Trinamool says police taking necessary action

title: Police act against 130 locals for possessing VPNs on mobile phones in Kashmir
content: ‚ÄúGenuine users were released after detailed device analysis with a strict warning to refrain from VPN usage in the future,‚Äù the police said

title: Arunachal celebrates India‚Äôs first sunrise of 2026 with ‚ÄòDance of the Dawn‚Äô
content: The performance was an artistic narrative through chants, songs, and indigenous rhythms of the Meyor and Mishmi communities, combined with contemporary dance and poetry

title: Oppose land distribution to workers, lose incentives: Assam CM to tea planters
content: The State government brought legislation to guarantee ‚Äúland protection‚Äù for 3.33 lakh tea plantation worker families across 825 estates

title: Kashmir cricketer sports Palestinian flag during match, comes under Jammu police scanner
content: Several players privy to the development said a cricketer, identified as Furqan Bhat, wore a helmet with a Palestinian flag on it

title: T.N. govt. revises rules on using funds for people hit by mining operations
content: The rules specify that a minimum of 70% of the District Mineral Trust Fund¬†must be spent only on directly affected areas, and¬†for high-priority sectors such as drinking water supply and health care

title: Let food be thy medicine: on nutrition as component of healing in oncology
content: Wholesome, nutrient-rich food can both protect from non-communicable diseases such as cancer and also serve as a pillar for recovery from cancer

title: Most Bihar Cabinet Ministers are wealthier than CM Nitish Kumar
content: Mr. Kumar‚Äôs assets are worth ‚Çπ1.66 crore, up ‚Çπ68,455 from last year; his Deputy CMs Samrat Choudhary and V.K. Sinha are significantly wealthier, with assets valued at ‚Çπ6.38 crore and ‚Çπ8.81 crore respectively

title: Post-festive rush chokes Bengaluru‚ÄìMysuru highway, Tumakuru Road, NICE Road
content: Commuters attribute the congestion to the simultaneous return of holidaymakers after an extended break

title: CM challenges KCR to discuss water projects in Assembly
content: Alleges lure of ‚Äúcommissions‚Äù responsible for PRLIS project cost rising from ‚Çπ32,000 crore to ‚Çπ84,000 crore; Mr. Revanth Reddy says government will inquire into the issue

title: 26 Indore water samples found contaminated
content: Official death toll at four, but residents say 14 people have died; 2,500 sick, 100 hospitalised; NHRC issues notice to M.P. Chief Secy; entire supply line cleaned, leakages repaired, water replaced, says Indore DC

title: From encroachment to legal ownership
content: Haryana government regularises unauthorised occupation of village panchayat land through payment, aiming to reduce litigation and resolve disputes; this risks converting encroachment into ownership, stabilising gains for those with ability to pay while limiting access for marginalised households on village commons

title: How a viral video led Maharashtra Police to a kidney transplant racket
content: Maharashtra investigators allege illegal network¬†involving two doctors with links to Cambodia; they say poor youth and marginalised farmers from the State sold kidneys for ‚Çπ5 lakh to ‚Çπ8 lakh

title: Officers to visit vulnerable groups for SIR hearings: Bengal CEO
content: Representatives of vulnerable communities had appealed to the Chief Electoral Officer to protect eligible electors unable to find their lineage in the 2002 voter list or provide required documents on account of their marginalised position

title: CITU conference condemns VB-G RAM G, SHANTI Acts, Labour Codes
content: VB-G RAM G Act has overturned statutory rights, alongwith imposing financial and administrative burden on the State governments, undermining the federal structure of the Constitution: CITU general secretary

title: Ensure Bengaluru does not become a gas chamber like Delhi, Khandre tells officials
content: Khandre says, ‚ÄòWhen I recently went to Delhi, it was difficult to breathe in the smog-filled atmosphere. The officials should be committed to protecting Bengaluru and strictly follow all the laws framed by the State and the Central governments for environmental protection.‚Äô

title: One killed as banner row triggers clash, firing near Janardhan Reddy‚Äôs residence in Ballari
content: Gunmen linked to Satish Reddy opened four or five rounds of fire, the former Minister says while displaying bullets used in the firing

title: NHAI to rope in new contractor to resume work on ‚Çπ22-crore vehicular underpass near Arcot town
content: This comes after the multi-crore project was abandoned by an earlier contractor due to lack of funds. Due to this, the police had allowed traffic on the incomplete elevated corridor above the underpass to decongest the narrow service lane leading to Vellore Town

title: Bound by Constitution, couple enter wedded life
content: Instead of traditional rituals, the couple, Sheetal and Jithin, exchanged copies of the Indian Constitution at their wedding

title: After months of silence, tourists flock to Kashmir to ring in the New Year
content: It is for the first time since the Pahalgam terror attack, which left 26 tourists dead in April last year, that the Kashmir valley recorded a bustling¬†tourist season

title: CM defends car trip with Vellappally Natesan, but refutes his remarks on CPI
content: Pinarayi Vijayan is not Binoy Viswam, says Chief Minister on the CPI leader‚Äôs comment that he would not have allowed Vellappally to travel in his car. CM, however, underscores the warm relations the CPI(M) has with the CPI

title: Kogilu demolition: Alternative housing for eligible families to be distributed on Jan. 2
content: Meanwhile, residents whose houses were demolished¬†in¬†Fakeer Colony and Waseem Layout¬†staged protests on¬†Thursday, alleging that the government had not clearly defined the eligibility criteria for allotment of alternative housing

title: Don‚Äôt need treaty with Dhaka to push back ‚Äòillegal immigrants‚Äô, says Himanta
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma is confident of a BJP victory in the 2026 Assembly election; he says the government plans to deport 10,000 to 15,000 foreigners every year

title: Why are government school teachers protesting in Tamil Nadu?
content: Tamil Nadu government school teachers protest for equal pay, demanding resolution of longstanding pay disparities

title: Sabarimala gold theft case: Pinarayi denies interference by his office in SIT probe
content: Chief Minister says it is common knowledge that SIT probe is monitored by High Court, ruling out need for a  CBI probe at this stage, adding that UDF convener‚Äôs allegation against CMO meant to divert attention from the real issue ‚Äî as to how the prime accused in the case gained access to a high-profile leader such as Sonia Gandhi

title: Liquor worth  ‚Çπ1,669 crore sold in the last week of December
content: Despite slump in sales of IML, excise revenue collection increases; government sets an excise revenue target at ‚Çπ40,000 crore for 2025-2026 financial year

title: Two new districts, Polavaram and Markapuram, come into force
content: The move, effective from December 31, 2025, aims to streamline governance, improve service delivery, and address regional development needs more effectively

title: Financial dominance over wife cannot qualify as ‚Äòcruelty‚Äô, Supreme Court judgment
content: Criminal litigation cannot become a gateway or a tool to settle scores and pursue personal vendettas, says the Apex Court.

title: BJP mouthpiece carries IUML organ‚Äôs edit page on New Year‚Äôs day
content: In a technical mix-up during the printing process, the Kannur-Kasaragod edition of Janmabhumi carried the editorial page of Chandrika daily, which had an article by League State president Syed Sadikali Shihab Thangal. The rare blooper, though jarring for Janmabhumi readers, helped Chandrika ‚Äòconnect with a different section of readers‚Äô

title: Charity donations replace New Year gifts at Sri Sathya Sai Collectorate
content: Novel initiative helps gather donations worth ‚Çπ2.62 lakh, including medical kits for TB patients, competitive examination books and blankets

title: Full fleet of 21 new six-coach trains to be deployed on Green Line, easing congestion on Purple Line
content: Namma Metro officials say that the plan involves shifting existing Phase-1 train sets currently operating on the Green Line to the 43-km Purple Line corridor between Whitefield and Challaghatta

title: 1,500 e-buses will be inducted into APSRTC fleet soon, says Dwaraka Tirumala Rao
content: In the new year, focus will be on improving passenger convenience and modernisation of bus stations and depots, says the RTC Managing Director

title: Elaborate arrangements put in place in Tiruvannamalai for Pournami festival
content: The temple will be kept open between 6.11 p.m. on Friday and 4 a.m. on Saturday for the festival. All devotees will be allowed for darshan for free during the festival. There will be a special darshan queue for senior citizens and pregnant women

title: BJP Kisan Morcha to hold roundtable on natural farming on January 3
content: The meeting aims to create awareness among farmers on all aspects of natural farming, says Kisan Morcha leader¬†Chigurupati Kumara Swamy

title: Sabarimala gold theft: Why was Kadakampally questioned in secrecy, asks Satheesan
content: Leader of the Opposition alleges political interference in SIT probe; demands High Court scrutiny of officer appointments

title: DRDO to play key role in Sudarshan Chakra air defence initiative: Rajnath Singh
content: Under the initiative, the DRDO will equip critical installations across the country with advanced air defence systems for comprehensive aerial protection over the next decade

title: Death of a 31-year-old migrant worker in a mob attack in Palakkad sparks outrage
content: Vigilantism raised its ugly head once again at Attapallam, near Walayar, Palakkad,  where a Chhattisgarh native was lynched. As the law enforcement agencies are busy booking the suspects in the case, Abdul Latheef Naha assesses the socio-political factors that played into the blood-curdling incident, which shocked the State.

title: Celebrations mark 208th Bhima Koregaon victory anniversary in Kalaburagi
content: Leaders of several organisations paid floral tributes to the chief architect of Constitution B.R. Ambedkar at Jagat Circle

title: 'Act by Jan 26': Canada asks Air India for action against 'tipsy' pilot
content: Air India faces scrutiny from Transport Canada after a pilot was found intoxicated before operating a flight from Vancouver on December 23, 2025. Canadian authorities reported the pilot failed a breathalyser test, leading to his removal from duty. Air India is investigating and has informed the DGCA, with potential enforcement action expected.

title: Indore water contamination: Deathly silence in Bhagirathpura; toll rises to nine
content: A contaminated water supply in Indore's Bhagirathpura has led to a severe diarrhoea outbreak, claiming nine lives and hospitalizing over 200 residents. A leaking toilet waste pit near a water line is blamed for the contamination. Families are grappling with loss and illness, with one teacher losing her six-month-old son.

title: Bengal SIR: EC warns of action if voters aged 85 and above called for hearings
content: Strict action awaits Booth Level Officers (BLOs) and their supervisors if elderly, sick, or disabled voters are summoned for hearings. Despite prior instructions, reports indicate these vulnerable individuals, including pregnant women, were still asked to appear. The Election Commission now mandates home verification for such electors, aiming to prevent distress and uphold its image.

title: India, Bangladesh begin talks on Ganges treaty
content: India and Bangladesh have commenced discussions to renew the Ganges Water Sharing Treaty, which expires in December 2026. Both nations have begun joint water level measurements of the Ganga and Padma rivers, with data to be collected bi-weekly until May 31. This initiative involves teams from both countries and highlights the importance of the ongoing negotiations.

title: Man held for AMU teacher's murder; police say it was 'revenge'
content: UP Police arrested Salman Quereshi for the revenge killing of AMU teacher Rao Danish Ali. Quereshi suspected Ali of being an informer in a 2018 murder case.  Associates Fahad and Yasir, along with prime accused Zubair, allegedly planned and executed the murder on December 24th.

title: Tesla's former AI boss: Waymo cannot match Tesla self driving tech; explains reason
content: Former Tesla AI chief Andrej Karpathy believes Google's Waymo couldn't replicate Tesla's recent coast-to-coast autonomous drive. He highlighted Tesla's end-to-end neural network versus Waymo's modular system, which struggled during a San Francisco power outage. Karpathy praised the milestone despite recent criticism from Elon Musk about his "dated" views.

title: Aravalli-like row in Bengaluru: SC panel to visit on Friday
content: A Supreme Court panel will inspect Bannerghatta National Park following a plea against a government decision to drastically shrink its eco-sensitive zone. Activists argue the move, reducing the zone from 268.9 sq km to 168.8 sq km, benefits mining and real estate interests, potentially harming wildlife and Bengaluru's green cover.

title: NMC orders hospitals to stock rabies drugs after Supreme Court flags stray threat
content: Medical colleges nationwide must now maintain constant stocks of anti-rabies vaccines and immunoglobulin, following Supreme Court directives. This crucial step ensures timely treatment for dog-bite victims, addressing rising incidents in public spaces. The National Medical Commission's order mandates uninterrupted availability, bolstering public health safety measures across institutions.

title: Four friends, including three women, killed in Kullu car crash after New Year-birthday party
content: Tragedy struck near Kullu as four young friends, returning from a New Year's Eve party, perished when their car collided with a roadside barrier and a parked truck. The victims, including three women, were just a kilometer from their homes. Preliminary investigations suggest the car was traveling at high speed.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: For SIR: UP man returns home from Bengal after 28 years; comes in search of documents
content: A man presumed dead for 28 years returned to his hometown in Muzaffarnagar to collect documents for West Bengal's electoral roll revision. Sharif Ahmed, who had moved to West Bengal after remarrying in 1997, reappeared to gather his father's death certificate and a domicile certificate. His return brought overwhelming emotion and disbelief to his relatives and locals.

title: RTI: Four of 10 faculty posts vacant across 11 AIIMS
content: Nearly 40% of sanctioned faculty posts remain vacant across 11 AIIMS, revealing a significant staffing crunch at India's premier public hospitals. This widespread shortage, affecting both older and newer institutes, raises concerns about patient care, specialist services, and medical education amidst rising patient loads.

title: When Steve Jobs sent an 'angry email' to Adobe CEO Bruce Chizen; said: One of us must change our ‚Ä¶
content: In 2005, Steve Jobs confronted Adobe CEO Bruce Chizen over alleged poaching of Apple employees. Jobs believed in a non-recruiting agreement, while Chizen proposed a senior-level exception. The exchange ultimately led to an agreement to avoid actively soliciting employees from either company.

title: Ukraine attack on Putin residence: After CIA rejects claim, Russia to give 'proof' to US
content: Russia stated it recovered data from a downed Ukrainian drone. Moscow claims this data shows the drone targeted a Russian presidential residence. Russia will share this information with the United States. Ukraine and US officials have denied the alleged attack. This incident follows a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: NMC clears 171 additional PG seats for 2025-26 academic year
content: Medical aspirants will benefit from 171 additional postgraduate seats approved by the NMC across various clinical specialties. Counselling authorities are directed to include these seats immediately for the 2025-26 academic year, following appeals by medical colleges against earlier decisions. This move aims to maximize seat utilization and provide more opportunities for aspiring doctors.

title: 'Anaconda strategy': Will Xi Jinping risk it all over Taiwan in 2026?
content: China's military drills near Taiwan, timed with the approaching 2027 deadline, signal Beijing's growing assertiveness under President Xi Jinping. The US is bolstering Taiwan's defenses amid concerns about delayed weapons and industrial capacity. Analysts warn of China's 'Anaconda strategy' and the potential for miscalculation, as Xi Jinping faces pressure to achieve 'reunification'.

title: Fans hail Ayesha Curry‚Äôs 'A+ wife move' as gesture for Stephen Curry goes viral
content: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Caitlin Clark & Connor McCaffery 2025 net worth: Earnings & endorsements
content: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery, a power couple in the sports world, boast a combined net worth of $11.5 million. Clark, a WNBA star, has secured lucrative endorsements alongside her rookie contract. McCaffery, a rising basketball coach, is building his career after playing multiple sports in college. Their individual successes contribute to their impressive financial standing.

title: NHL trade rumours: Canucks linked to Sherwood, Pettersson; Bruins eye Maccelli
content: NHL trade buzz is intensifying as the Vancouver Canucks reportedly explore deals involving Kiefer Sherwood and Elias Pettersson. Meanwhile, the Boston Bruins are rumored to be eyeing Matias Maccelli to bolster their offense. With the March 6 trade deadline looming, these potential moves are capturing significant league attention, hinting at imminent roster changes for both franchises.

title: Hindu man attacked in Bangladesh: Mob pours petrol, sets him on fire; victim critical
content: The incident took place around 9.30 pm in the Damudya area, near Keurbhanga Bazar in the Koneshwar Union. The victim, 50-year-old Khokon Chandra Das, was reportedly waylaid, beaten and doused with petrol before being set ablaze, reported news agency ANI, citing Prothom Alo. Das was later shifted to Dhaka for advanced treatment as his condition worsened, the report said.

title: 'Ceiling on fire': Panicked partygoers smashed windows; witnesses recount Swiss bar horror
content: A devastating fire ripped through a packed New Year's Eve party at a Swiss ski resort bar, causing panic and a desperate escape. Witnesses described scenes of chaos as revellers smashed windows to flee flames and smoke. Dozens are feared dead and over 100 injured, with many young people believed to be among the victims.

title: Combing op in Poonch after drone drops ‚ÄòIED‚Äô along LoC
content: Security forces launched a combing operation in Jammu and Kashmir's Poonch district after a drone reportedly dropped an IED and weapons. Searches by the Army, special operations group, and local police recovered a bag with ammunition rounds and a suspected IED in a tiffin box.

title: Pakistan-based terror handler‚Äôs property attached in Poonch
content: Jammu and Kashmir Police have attached agricultural land worth Rs 10 lakh belonging to Pakistan-based terror handler Rafiq Nai. Nai, a launch commander for Tahreek-ul-Mujahideen / Jammu Kashmir Ghaznavi Force, is accused of supervising narcotics and weapons smuggling and facilitating terrorist infiltration. This action is part of a strategy to dismantle terror support networks.

title: BSF nabs Bangladeshi national near border; hands him over to police
content: A 19-year-old Bangladeshi national, Shariful Islam Bhuiyan, was apprehended by BSF near the international border in Jammu. He arrived in India on December 1, 2025, and claimed to be a tourist seeking a Portugal visa. Authorities are verifying his travel documents and digital devices.

title: J&K govt will discuss Kashmiri shawl sellers‚Äô harassment with states concerned, says NC
content: National Conference expresses concern over alleged assaults on Kashmiri shawl sellers nationwide, with J&K government to address the issue with concerned state governments. The Union Home Ministry has taken note of the attacks, and the Jammu and Kashmir Students Association has urged the Home Minister for intervention.

title: Robert Pires & Jessica Lemarie net worth: Arsenal glory and earnings
content: Robert Pires, a key Arsenal winger during their modern era, earned significant income from his playing career and post-retirement media work. While his wife, Jessica Lemarie, contributes to their public profile, most net worth estimates heavily rely on Pires' documented earnings, placing their combined wealth between $12 to $20 million.

title: Ladakh's new chief secy Ashish Kundra vows peace
content: New Ladakh Chief Secretary Ashish Kundra prioritizes addressing people's aspirations and preserving the Union territory's civilisational history of peace. He also voiced concerns over Ladakh's fragile ecology, cautioning against reckless development amid heightened demands for statehood and Sixth Schedule status.

title: Iran unrest: 3 killed as protests spread; chants against theocracy grow louder
content: Protests over Iran's economic woes have led to at least three reported deaths, marking the largest unrest since 2022. While demonstrations have slowed in Tehran, they've expanded to rural provinces, with fatalities occurring in cities inhabited by the Lur ethnic group. The unrest, fueled by economic pressures, also includes chants against the theocratic system.

title: 'Want nice blood': Trump blames hand bruises on Aspirin; dismisses health concerns
content: President Donald Trump tackled rumors surrounding his health, explaining that recent hand bruises were merely the result of his daily aspirin regimen. He dismissed allegations of dozing off during meetings as unfounded, emphasizing that his recent health evaluation was a CT scan rather than an MRI.

title: India, Pakistan exchange list of nuke sites: What is 1988 agreement? Explained
content: India and Pakistan have exchanged lists of their nuclear installations and facilities, marking the 35th consecutive annual update under a 1988 agreement. This routine exchange, continuing even during periods of tension, aims to prevent accidental or deliberate attacks on critical nuclear infrastructure, fostering predictability between the two nuclear-armed neighbours.

title: Noah Lyles sends strong message before new season as Junelle Bromfield reacts
content: Noah Lyles posted a reflective and driven note on social media following a great 2025 campaign to show his commitment to ongoing development and consistency. Openly supportive, his fianc√©e Junelle Bromfield said she trusted in his future performances. With many World Championship gold medals, an increasing presence outside the track, and a focused attitude going into the following season, Lyles has set the mood for what he expects to be yet another significant year.

title: IIT-Hyd student lands Rs 2.5 cr package; highest in institute‚Äôs history
content: A computer science engineering student from IIT Hyderabad has achieved a historic Rs 2.5 crore package from a Netherlands-based firm, marking the highest ever at the institution. This achievement comes amidst a challenging job market, with the student converting a two-month internship into a pre-placement offer. The institute also saw a significant 75% jump in average packages.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Over 70 wishes to share ‚Äî images, quotes, status & more
content: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: TOI Survey On Consumer Behaviour: Fitness, OTT, and food top 2025 priorities; taste, comfort drive choices
content: Indians are prioritizing fitness, with visible results being key for many. Entertainment sees a surge in OTT consumption, while mindful scrolling increases. Financially, budgeting and goal-setting are paramount. Travel experiences are driven by relaxation and shareable aesthetics. Comfort food reigns supreme, with taste quality being the ultimate food experience driver.

title: Panthers vs Rangers: Date, time and where to watch NHL Winter Classic
content: Hockey enthusiasts, mark your calendars! The 2026 NHL Winter Classic heads to Miami's LoanDepot Park on January 2nd, featuring the Florida Panthers against the New York Rangers. This historic event sets a new benchmark as the southernmost outdoor NHL game ever. Tune in on TNT, truTV, or stream via DIRECTV for a unique celebration of the sport.

title: BMC polls shake-up: Why BJP denied tickets to almost 40% of its 2017 corporators
content: The BJP has dropped nearly 40% of its 2017 corporators for the upcoming BMC elections, making way for new faces and defectors.  While some wards were reserved, others saw incumbents sidelined to accommodate fresh talent.  The party, which won 82 seats previously, released a list of 137 candidates, with many former corporators from western suburbs notably absent.

title: Inside India‚Äôs Rs 5 canteens: From Tamil Nadu to Delhi, how cooked meals fill the last-mile gap
content: Delhi's new Atal Canteens offer a Rs 5 meal, joining a national trend of government-run low-cost food initiatives. These canteens aim to provide dignified, affordable nutrition to daily wage earners and the urban poor. While demand is high, initial operations faced challenges with supply and capacity, highlighting the ongoing need for such services across India.

title: Kargil hero in Bengal voter drive: Ex-soldier queues up to reclaim rights amid SIR gap
content: A Kargil war hero, Sanjib Bhattacharya, and his family are among 32 lakh citizens in Bengal facing hearings to regain voting rights after being excluded from the 2002 electoral rolls due to border duty and job assignments outside the state. Residents and a local councillor expressed anger over the perceived harassment of former soldiers, calling for special arrangements.

title: Plan first, invest later: Why choice between new & old tax regimes requires deep planning
content: Taxpayers are facing higher tax outgo due to incorrect regime choices, often stemming from misunderstandings of exemptions and documentation. Experts advise projecting liabilities under both regimes, with high HRA and rent payments favoring the old system, while low rent benefits the new.

title: Who is Aileen Lopera? Stefon Diggs‚Äô new baby mama amid pregnancy claim
content: Stefon Diggs and Cardi B have been dragged into a new drama as the star player's new baby mama has alleged that she is pregnant with his child again. Aileen Lopera has sued Stefon Diggs for the second time as the star player is already involved in a messy legal trouble with his former private chef who has accused him of physical violence.

title: Charles Barkley‚Äôs net worth 2025‚Äì26: NBA legend‚Äôs $90M fortune, deals
content: Charles Barkley, the former NBA star, has amassed a significant net worth of $90 million by 2025-26, fueled by lucrative broadcasting deals and past endorsements.  His career transitioned from the court to successful stints on TNT and CNN, significantly boosting his income beyond his NBA earnings.  Barkley's enduring popularity continues to drive his financial success.

title: 'Turn up the heat': Trump shares editorial critical of Putin amid failing Ukraine talks
content: US President Donald Trump is intensifying pressure on Russia's Vladimir Putin, advocating for a tougher stance amid stalled Ukraine peace talks. An editorial shared by Trump argues Russia is obstructing peace, urging Washington to abandon concessions and adopt a "bigger stick" approach. This comes as both sides report escalating hostilities and drone attacks, underscoring the volatile situation.

title: Which NBA star had the best year? The 2025 Golden Basketball goes to ...
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder are 1-2 again in the first installment of the MVP straw poll conducted by ESPN's Tim Bontemps . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Nikola Jokic of the Denver Nuggets battled for MVP of the 2024-25 regular season .

title: NFL playoff schedule, projected bracket: Here's what to know in both conferences
content: the playoffs will begin Saturday, Jan. 10 with the first two wild-card round games . there are two open spots (one in each conference), uncertainty for both the AFC and NFC 1-seeds and a few division titles out there for the taking . we won't know the complete playoff bracket until late Sunday night .

title: 'Need this on my fridge': Bucs TEs' festive Christmas cards lost in mail
content: two Tampa Bay Buccaneers teammates posted a series of hilariously awkward holiday photos on Instagram . the two were seen wearing matching head-to-toe outfits and striking an assortment of cheesy poses in front of a Christmas tree . no players were injured attempting the stunt .

title: No more Exit 30: Davidson renames historic exit after Stephen Curry
content: Stephen Curry is renamed Stephen Curry Interchange for his contributions to the school's men's basketball program . the star has worn the number 30 throughout his college and the pro career . he wore his Davidson sweatsuit along with a pair of "Carmine" Air Jordan Retro 6's .

title: Are Arsenal better with Merino at striker than Gy√∂keres? Breaking down tactics, stats, more
content: Mikel Arteta and the arsenal hierarchy zeroed in on Viktor Gy√∂keres . the former Sporting CP forward has struggled to make a mark . he scored just 15 touches against Wolverhampton Wanderers on Dec. 13 .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up
content: the New York Knicks are sporting the no. 3 best offense in the league in December . but keep an eye on the race for the play-in as we approach the back half of the regular season . it's a close race at the top of the East with the Detroit Pistons holding strong at No. 1 .

title: MLB offseason grades: Astros land Japanese ace Tatsuya Imai
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if it's a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future, we'll weigh in with what it all means for next season and beyond .

title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
content: Zachariah Branch puts Georgia up 3 scores with a 13-yard receiving touchdown . the former USC receiver and his brother, Zion, entered the transfer portal in 2024 . "he made me aware of him," coach Kirby Smart said .

title: CFP quarterfinal takeaways: Oregon's defense rules sloppy Orange Bowl
content: the 12-team college football playoff has existed for two seasons now . the lower-seeded team has won all six quarterfinals to date . a top-four seed will ever win a CFP game .
